properties.description: BlobStorageTrigger to convert Base64 to string

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		EventTime as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		Category as string,
		EMT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> InputCNCData
source(output(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity as string,
		Tag_D2_Blue as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Temperature as string,
		Tag_D1_Analog as string,
		Tag_Modbus_CO2 as string,
		Tag_D0_Digital as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> IoTHubData
InputCNCData, IoTHubData join(InputCNCData@Tag_Modbus_Humidity != IoTHubData@Tag_Modbus_Humidity,
	joinType:'outer',
	broadcast: 'left')~> LinkIoTHumidityData
LinkIoTHumidityData sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		EventTime as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		Category as string,
		EMT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data.csv'],
	mapColumn(
		{$dtId} = InputCNCData@{$dtId},
		{$timestamp} = InputCNCData@{$timestamp},
		ErrorCode,
		TotalNum,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity = IoTHubData@Tag_Modbus_Humidity,
		CreateTime,
		Status,
		EventTime,
		SequentialNumber,
		Category,
		EMT
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CNCDataWithHumidityData

properties.description: Prepares the CNC Data Set for adding the IoT Hub Data

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Category as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> InputCNCData
InputCNCData sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		ErrorCode as string,
		TotalNum as string,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		Status as string,
		EventTime as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		Category as string,
		EMT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data-intermediate.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		{$dtId} = {$dtid},
		{$timestamp},
		ErrorCode,
		TotalNum,
		Tag_Modbus_Humidity = EMT,
		CreateTime,
		Status,
		EventTime,
		SequentialNumber,
		Category,
		EMT
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OutputCNCData

source(output(
		{$dtid} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		EMT as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		ToolNo as string,
		UseCount as string,
		LimitCount as string,
		UseCountAfter as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> InputCNCData
InputCNCData sink(input(
		{$dtId} as string,
		{$timestamp} as string,
		UseCountAfter as string,
		ToolNo as string,
		LimitCount as string,
		UseCount as string,
		SequentialNumber as string,
		CreateTime as string,
		EMT as string,
		EventTime as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['partition-data.csv'],
	truncate: true,
	mapColumn(
		{$dtId} = {$dtid},
		{$timestamp},
		UseCountAfter,
		ToolNo,
		LimitCount,
		UseCount,
		SequentialNumber,
		CreateTime,
		EMT,
		EventTime
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> CDMConvertedData
